module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *13.0.16* Fix permission management in User Manager *13.0.15* FREEPBX-10209 Force charset UTF-8 in voicemail.conf *13.0.14* FREEPBX-10223 Fix form sumbition *13.0.13* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.12* Invalid array fix *13.0.11* FREEPBX-10129 Deleting extension does not delete voicemail user *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10100 fix help text, FREEPBX-10096 fix extra includes, FREEPBX-10126 VMX *13.0.9.1* Minor layout tweaks *13.0.9* Use proper astman checks *13.0.8* Use internal parsing engine *13.0.7* Try to catch more errors *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9726 ignore comment warnings *13.0.5* Dont write to files if the array is empty *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9685 dont require an email address unless attachment is set to yes, FREEPBX-9686 dont throw exception when vmailbox exists *13.0.3* Invalid loop errors *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha14* Better quick create visuals *13.0.1alpha13* Add hooks for bulk handler *13.0.1alpha12* Invalid Foreach fixes *13.0.1alpha11* Groups in usermanager *13.0.1alpha10* FREEPBX-8982 click to call/copy for voicemail in UCP *13.0.1alpha9* FREEPBX-8946 Add attach and delete options to user settings *13.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-8927 Badge count equal to 1 when no voicemail *13.0.1alpha7* saycid not playcid *13.0.1alpha6* Migrate vm_general.inc to voicemail.conf *13.0.1alpha5* Dont pound the actual file *13.0.1alpha4* Dont fatal during mailbox add *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-8130 Move emailbody back into voicemail.conf so that it shows up in Voicemail Admin *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-8555 Support passwordless voicemail retrieval in device/user mode *13.0.1alpha1* Layout changes *12.0.20* pagination fixes *12.0.19* FREEPBX-8211 Improvements to UCP Voicemail/CDR Playback *12.0.18* Restructure Voicemail in UCP, FREEPBX-8198 Add pagination, FREEPBX-8207 fix converting process *12.0.17* Add res_mwi_devstate now for 12 installations *12.0.16* Tweaks for UCP *12.0.15* Stop playing voicemails in UCP when they are deleted *12.0.14* FREEPBX-7542 fixes UCP not renumbering voicemails *12.0.13* FREEPBX-7500 Make User voicemail settings uniform *12.0.12* FREEPBX-7326 fixes issue of enabling setting if module doesnt exist. *12.0.11* VmX Temp addition and Fixes and UCP conflict fixes *12.0.10* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *12.0.9* Restructure Parts of UCP *12.0.8* Cleanup in UCP *12.0.7* Auto Saving for UCP *12.0.6* UCP Module Adjustments *12.0.5* Small fixes for UCP FREEPBX-7293 *12.0.4* Set message limit for UCP display *12.0.3* Work on GUI for button work in Framework, numerous changes and additions for User Control Panel on the backend *12.0.2* FREEPBX-6471 allow asterisk in password field *12.0.1* Use BMO object to add the Asterisk mwi module if it exists *12.0.0* Added back the ability to have an extension call voicemail and not have to enter a password, re FREEPBX-5323 *2.11.1.1* Fix #6967 (missing help popups) and PBXAC-12 (unable to delete greetings/recordings) *2.11.1.0* Reorganize and rework module. Clean up and fixed #6769 *2.11.0.4* #6712 *2.11.0.3* #6246 *2.11.0.2* #6111 *2.11.0.1* install_amp corner case error fix *2.11.0.0* #6015 *2.10.0.4* #5894 *2.10.0.3* #5639 *2.10.0.2* #5135, #5168 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.5* #5072 *2.9.0.4* #5036, #5062 *2.9.0.3* #5000 *2.9.0.2* #4401 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4653, #4734, #4736, merge vmailadmin
module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
